topComments.author: Tara Woolard
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este foi um √≥timo lugar para voc√™ obter crian√ßas! Meu filho se divertiu muito. We stayed all day and enjoyed pretty much all the rides and interactive displays they had. The food we had was great and well made. topComments.author: K Surace
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este foi um dos meus lugares favoritos para visitar quando meus filhos eram pequenos. Agora trazemos nossos netos. Os passeios e tema do parque s√£o voltados para crian√ßas mais novas. Provavelmente mais adequado para as idades de 1 a 12 anos. Meu filho, agora crescido, me levou aqui na √©poca do Natal apenas para passear e compartilhar as mem√≥rias que t√≠nhamos vindo aqui quando ele era pequeno. √â um lugar para fazer mem√≥rias com certeza. Eles adicionaram novos passeios ao longo dos anos, bem como uma pequena √°rea de splash pad para a temporada de ver√£o. Concess√µes est√£o dispon√≠veis para almo√ßo, lanches. e bebidas. A √©poca do Natal √© m√°gica. Papai Noel, milhares de luzes multicoloridas, chocolate quente‚Ä¶ As tarifas s√£o bastante razo√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãe voc√™ pode economizar quase US$ 4 por pessoa comprando ingressos online. Eu nunca me canso deste lugar; Acho que voc√™ tamb√©m vai adorar.  (Original) This has been one of my favorite places to visit when my children were little. Now we bring our grandchildren. The rides and theme of the park are geared toward younger children. Probably best suited for ages 1 - 12. My son, now grown, took me here at Christmas time just to walk around and share the memories we had coming here when he was little. It a place to make memories for sure. They have added new rides over the years as well as a small splash pad area for the summer season. Concessions are available for lunch, snacks. and beverages. Christmas time is magical.  Santa, thousands of multicolored lights, hot chocolate‚Ä¶ Rates are fairly reasonable and you can save almost $4 per person by purchasing tickets online. I never get tired of this place; I think you will love it too.

topComments.author: Mr. Haberern Paradise
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Inesperadamente uma fatia incr√≠vel do c√©u!!! Bonecas se tornam os her√≥is de todas as can√ß√µes de ninar. Para os adultos pode parecer assustador, mas para uma crian√ßa ou crian√ßa pequena, √© um momento emocionante de fasc√≠nio. Eu fui aqui quando crian√ßa. Desde ent√£o, os passeios foram adicionados, ent√£o eu esperava que a parte do Nursery Rhyme fosse esgotada. N√ÉO T√ÉO! Este parque √© absolutamente lindo e perfeitamente atualizado e restaurado. √â pura divers√£o imaginativa e envolvente, mas n√£o √© superestimulante como a maioria dos entretenimentos atuais. H√° uma sensa√ß√£o de retrocesso, um passo atr√°s para quando os tempos eram muito mais simples. No entanto, com os passeios, adiciona muito o que fazer, voc√™ n√£o pode aproveitar tudo ao m√°ximo em um dia. A comida √© fant√°stica e acess√≠vel. O pre√ßo de admiss√£o muito razo√°vel. Se seus filhos t√™m mais de 10 anos, eu iria para outro lugar, mas tente chegar aqui antes deles. Os caminhos do parque serpenteiam em torno de grandes e belas √°rvores que proporcionam sombra e beleza. Os funcion√°rios s√£o todos atenciosos e extremamente simp√°ticos. Quase todos os passeios tamb√©m lhe d√£o a oportunidade de andar com seu filho. Minha neta queria ir em passeios repetidamente e ela tamb√©m adoraria passar por cada casa e atra√ß√£o Nursery Rhyme repetidamente. O truque n√£o √© apressar seus filhos, mas deix√°-los mergulhar nessa experi√™ncia maravilhosamente imaginativa!  (Original) Unexpectedly an amazing slice of heaven!!! Dolls become the heros of all the Nursery Rhymes. To adults it may seem creepy, but to a toddler or young child, it is a gripping moment of fascination.   I went here as a child. Since then rides were added,so I expected the Nursery Rhyme portion to be run down. NOT SO! This park is absolutely beautiful and perfectly updated and restored. It's pure imaginative and engaging fun, but it's not over-stimulating like most entertainment today.  There is a throwback feel, a step back to when times were much more simple. Yet, with the rides, it adds so much to do, you can't possibly enjoy everything to the fullest in one day. The food is fantastic and affordable. The admission price very reasonable.  If your children are older than 10, I'd go elsewhere, but try to get here before they are.  The park's pathways wind around large beautiful trees that provide both shade and beauty.  The staff are all caring and extremely friendly. Almost every ride also gives you an opportunity to ride with your child. My granddaughter wanted to go on rides over and over and she would also love just going through each house and Nursery Rhyme attraction over and over. The trick is not to rush your children, but to let them become immersed in this wonderfully imaginative experience!

topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Terra m√°gica para crian√ßas pequenas.  Este lugar √© realmente lindo. √â quase hora de ver√£o e √°rvores/verdura fazem este lugar se destacar. N√£o experimentei comida l√°, mas pelo menos nas m√°quinas de venda autom√°tica, posso dizer que √© um pouco caro (como √© o caso de todos os parques tem√°ticos)  Os banheiros s√£o limpos.  (Original) Magic land for small kids.  This place is really beautiful. It's almost summer time and trees/greenary makes this place stand out. In 85F, feels so good because of the trees.  It's a must visit for families with small kids. It has mostly 5-10 year old rides, but overall place looks like a small magic kingdom.  The best part is it's walkable.  Parking is just outside and it's free. Didn't try food there but at least from vending machines I can tell it is bit expensive (as the case with every theme park)  Restrooms are clean.

topComments.author: Melanie Oeun

I like that they allow you to pack your own food because the wait time to get food from some of the places are long.    Overall, it is a nice place to hang out with your little ones.

The food was good for an amusement park (made to order) and the soft serve ice cream was great!  We're definitely coming back!

topComments.author: Kimberly Van Leer

This place is really catered to small children because all they need is an adult or responsible person to go on the ride with them. Everyone is extremely nice and the park is very clean. topComments.author: Lisa Buck
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Amo este lugar e sempre amei! T√£o perfeito para fam√≠lias. Eu adoro ver as luzes de Natal enquanto ando bebendo um pouco de chocolate quente ouvindo a m√∫sica de Natal tocando. Eu provavelmente ainda viria aqui, mesmo sem filhos durante as f√©rias. No entanto, ter filhos torna tudo muito mais divertido. Fica muito lotado, mas se voc√™ ficar at√© mais tarde, a multid√£o diminui e voc√™ pode fazer tudo em muito menos tempo. O Papai Noel aqui tamb√©m √© o melhor em que j√° estive. Ele era muito interativo e hipnotizou meus meninos. A comida? Sua comida t√≠pica de parque. Eu sugeriria baixar o aplicativo chamado Fanfood e fazer o pedido com anteced√™ncia. Voc√™ consegue contornar a linha muito longa. Voc√™ receber√° um texto quando sua comida estiver pronta e voc√™ simplesmente vai busc√°-la. Super simples.  (Original) Love this place and always have! So perfect for families. I love seeing the Christmas lights while walking around drinking some hot chocolate listening to the Christmas music playing. I would probably still come here even without kids during the holidays. However, having kids makes it that much more fun. It gets very crowded but if you stay later, the crowd thins out and you can do everything in a lot less time. The Santa here is also the best I've been to. He was very interactive and had my boys mesmerized. The food? Your typical park food. I would suggest downloading the app called Fanfood and order ahead. You get to bypass the very long line. You will receive a text when your food is ready and you just go pick it up. Super simple.

topComments.author: Alexandra Roussos
topComments.comment: My kids had a great time here. They are 4 and 1 year old and it's the perfect park for their ages. We were able to go on almost every ride due to no lines. It was extremely clean around the park as well as the restrooms. They definitely maintain everything considering how old the park is. It's adorable and nostalgic and you cannot beat the admission price.  I should note we also went on Memorial Day and it wasn't overpacked with people.

topComments.author: carol weaver
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Hoje meus dois netos autistas e nora visitaram o Papai Noel. Foi uma visita muito especial. O Papai Noel e a Sra. Noel eram gentis e calmos e n√£o apressavam as crian√ßas. O Papai Noel leu a lista da minha neta de 6 anos e fez quest√£o de coloc√°-la em uma caixa especial para que pudesse entregar os presentes conforme solicitado. Isso trouxe l√°grimas aos olhos da minha nora. √Äs vezes, trazer crian√ßas at√≠picas para um evento como este n√£o vai bem, mas foi uma experi√™ncia excepcional. Feliz Natal e Deus Aben√ßoe a Todos  (Original) Today my two autistic grandchildren and daughter-in - law visited Santa. It was a most special visit. Santa and Mrs. Claus were kind and calm and did not rush the children. Santa read my 6 year old granddaughter‚Äôs list and made sure to put it in a special box so he could deliver her gifts as requested. My four year old grandson seemed to be most interested in Santa and remained calm the entire time. It brought tears to my daughter- in- law‚Äôs eyes. Sometimes bringing Atypical children to an event like this does not go well but this was an exceptional experience. Merry Christmas and God Bless Everyone

topComments.author: Lynette Peterson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Visitamos em uma sexta-feira muito quente no final de agosto. Estava ocupado, mas as linhas eram curtas e a equipe foi excelente. O parque estava super limpo. A comida era realmente muito boa. Os passeios eram perfeitos para as nossas meninas de 3 e 7 anos. O tempo estava duro com trovoadas, mas depois da chuva o parque ficou deserto e foi perfeito! Os pre√ßos s√£o razo√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãe um dia aqui √© o que as crian√ßas mais novas v√£o gostar. Vamos absolutamente voltar novamente.  (Original) We visited on a very hot Friday at the end of August. It was busy but lines were short and the staff was excellent. The park was super clean. The food was actually really good.  The rides were perfect for our 3 and 7 year old girls.  The weather was tough with thunderstorms but after the rain the park was deserted and it was perfect! The prices are reasonable and a day here is just what younger kids will enjoy. We will absolutely return again.

topComments.author: Shaun
topComments.comment: Yeah, my little guy loved it. So that's all I can really ask. Everybody there was super awesome and it was a super clean park.  Loved it and will go back to continue the tradition :)

topComments.author: Trish Conklyn
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© perfeito para idades de 2 a 8! Os passeios s√£o do tamanho perfeito para crian√ßas e adultos pedalarem juntos. (Original) This place is perfect for ages 2-8! The rides are the perfect size for kids and adults to ride together. The park is big enough you can spend hours there but small enough that it's not an all day event. Advice: buy tickets online in advance, you save a few bucks. Also bring change - there are games & animal feed you can purchase. There is food there but you can also bring your own. It is well shaded, so even in summer it's completely doable. It is so incredibly clean and the staff is very kind.
